oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: H. C. Nixon correspondence with Lula Ulrica Whitaker, 1934 April 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Nixon, H. C. (Herman Clarence), 1886-1967
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from H. C. Nixon to Lula Ulrica Whitaker describing his operation of a farm as part of his committment to the Agrarian movement, expressed in I'll Take My Stand: The South and the Agrarian Tradition.
